infotexts.entitydescription.fabricatorVGM: An old, self-assembling fabrication table once found everywhere. While outdated for most production tasks, it can still be modified to provide weapon attachments. Requires power to function.\nDisassemble with a Crowbar. Press and hold RMB, then press "E" to place.
infotexts.entitydescription.flashHiderMuzzleVGM: Effectively reduces recoil during sustained fire and provides a minor damage increase. Often the preferred choice for automatic weapons. Compatible with most weapons and multiple calibers.
infotexts.entitydescription.longBarrelMuzzleVGM: Increases muzzle velocity, enhancing damage potential and armor penetration. Not suitable for compact weapons. Note: Excessively long barrels are impractical for close-quarters combat.
infotexts.entitydescription.longSilencerMuzzleVGM: This suppressor, crafted from alien materials with natural magnetism, reduces firing noise while significantly increasing muzzle velocity for a notable damage boost. Not suitable for compact weapons.
infotexts.entitydescription.shortSilencerMuzzleVGM: A basic suppressor that reduces firing noise, provides a minor damage increase, and slightly reduces recoil. Compatible with most weapons.
infotexts.entitydescription.deadeyeStockVGM: The standard stock for the DeadEye Rifle. Leaving the stock slot empty converts the weapon to a bullpup configuration, increasing spread but granting a 10% movement speed bonus.
infotexts.entitydescription.boomStickStockVGM: The standard stock for the Boom Stick. Leaving the stock slot empty converts the weapon to a bullpup configuration, increasing spread but granting a 10% movement speed bonus.
infotexts.entitydescription.rifleStockVGM: The standard rifle stock. Leaving the stock slot empty converts the weapon to a bullpup configuration, increasing spread but granting a 10% movement speed bonus.
infotexts.entitydescription.shotgunStockVGM: The standard stock for the Riot Shotgun. Leaving the stock slot empty converts the weapon to a bullpup configuration, increasing spread but granting a 10% movement speed bonus.
infotexts.entitydescription.assaultRifleStockVGM: The standard stock for the Assault Rifle. Leaving the stock slot empty converts the weapon to a bullpup configuration, increasing spread but removing the default movement speed penalty.
infotexts.entitydescription.hmgStockVGM: The standard stock for the Heavy Machine Gun. Leaving the stock slot empty converts the weapon to a bullpup configuration, increasing spread but offsetting 50% of the default movement speed penalty.
infotexts.entitydescription.nuclearGunStockVGM: The standard stock for the Fission Accelerator. Leaving the stock slot empty converts the weapon to a bullpup configuration, increasing spread but granting a 10% movement speed bonus.
infotexts.entitydescription.scrapCannonStockVGM: The standard stock for the Scrap Cannon. Leaving the stock slot empty converts the weapon to a bullpup configuration, increasing spread but granting a 10% movement speed bonus.
infotexts.entitydescription.lightStockVGM: A stock crafted from pipes, installable on most light weapons. Improves mobility but hinders precise aiming, though it's still better than no stock.
infotexts.entitydescription.heavyStockVGM: A heavy stock with adjustable weights, only suitable for Assault Rifles and HMGs. Effectively reduces aim spread but impacts mobility.
infotexts.entitydescription.sniperStockVGM: An ergonomically designed heavy stock, only suitable for Assault Rifles and HMGs. Minimizes aim spread to the greatest extent but significantly impacts weapon mobility.
infotexts.entitydescription.holoGraphicScopeVGM: A compact holographic sight that extends the weapon's effective visual range. Suitable for most weapons.
infotexts.entitydescription.dotScopeVGM: A compact red dot sight that extends the weapon's effective visual range. Suitable for most weapons.
infotexts.entitydescription.acogScopeVGM: An ACOG 4x scope. Some designs never go out of style, even in the space colonization era. Effectively extends the weapon's visual range. Suitable for most weapons.
infotexts.entitydescription.sniperScopeVGM: An 8x sniper scope that maximizes the weapon's visual range. Not suitable for compact weapons. Note: High magnification can hinder close-quarters performance.
infotexts.entitydescription.scope: 6x Rifle Scope, not suitable for compact weapons.
infotexts.entitydescription.verticalGripVGM: A vertical foregrip helps maintain tactical posture for extended periods and reduces aim-down-sights time.
infotexts.entitydescription.angleGripVGM: An angled foregrip helps maintain a muzzle-up tactical posture for extended periods, reducing aim-down-sights time.
infotexts.entitydescription.smgDrummagVGM: Triple ammo capacity, harder to carry.
infotexts.entitydescription.assaultrifleDrumMagVGM: Triple ammo capacity, harder to carry.
infotexts.entitydescription.hmgDrumMagVGM: This massive drum magazine holds over 200 rounds of 5.56 ammunition, ensuring sustained firepower.
infotexts.entitydescription.redLazerVGM: A laser sight with customizable color. To change color: Press and hold RMB + E to place it on a wall, then interact with LMB.\nRecommended Colors: Sci-Fi Blue (23,150,214); Proton Purple (138,43,226); Plastic Pink (255,20,147); Classic Red (255,0,0); Radioactive Green (0,255,5)
infotexts.entitydescription.healthScannerVGM: A health scanner that can be mounted on firearms. Requires aiming down sights (RMB) to activate.
infotexts.entitydescription.thermalScannerVGM: A thermal imager that can be mounted on firearms. Requires aiming down sights (RMB) to activate.
infotexts.entitydescription.lightSniperStockVGM: A marksman stock designed for light weapons. Reduces aim spread at the cost of slightly reduced mobility. Not suitable for heavy weapons.
